te: ఇడ్లీ, పూరీ, మినపట్టూ, పెసరట్టూ మరియు ఉప్మా ఉన్నాయి.
en: There are idli, poori, minapattu, pesarattu and upma.
hi: इडली, पूरी, मिनपट्टू, पॆसरट्टू, और उप्मा हैं।

en: Minapattu and pesarattu are also hot.
hi: मिनपट्टू और पॆसरट्टू भी गरम हैं।

en: Do you want minapattu? Or do you want pesarattu?
hi: तुम्हे मिनपट्टू चाहिए? या पॆसरट्टू चाहिए?

en: What do you want among these?
Then I need only cold water.
The drinking water available in this hotel is not cold.
hi: इस होटल में पानी ठंडा नहीं है।

en: Then who is there in the class?

te: ఆ కాయితం మీద ఎర్రగా ఉంది; ఏమిటది?
en: Something is reddish on that paper; what is it?
hi: उस कागज़ पर कुछ लाल है; वह क्या है?

en: Breakfast or light meal (Indian English word)
minapattu (savory pancake made from skinned black gram batter)
pesarattu (savory pancake made from green gram batter)
name of a patent health drink product Bournvita
